article_title: House Panel Head Blames Clinton for Email Controversy
article_text:
WASHINGTON—The chairman of the House committee investigating the 2012 terrorist attacks on U.S. diplomatic facilities in Libya said former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton was responsible for creating the controversy over her email usage, countering her argument that the dispute was politically motivated.

“I get that she’s frustrated. Sometimes when people are frustrated they look in the mirror and they engage in a little bit of self-reflection and sometimes they lash out and blame nonexistent right-wing conspiracies...

twitter.description: The chairman of the House committee investigating the attacks on U.S. diplomatic facilities in Benghazi, Libya, said Hillary Clinton was responsible for creating the controversy over her email, countering her argument that the dispute is politically motivated.
twitter.creator: @ByronTau

Sometimes when people are frustrated they look in the mirror and they engage in a little bit of self-reflection and sometimes they lash out and blame nonexistent right-wing conspiracies...
